qas.question: Who is the chair of the IPCC?
Who is the vice-chair of the IPCC?
Who was the first chair of the IPCC?
When did Pachauri resign as chair of the IPCC?
Who is the President of the IPCC?
What year did Hoesung Lee become President?
Who was President of the IPCC before Hoesung Lee?
In what year did El Gizouli resign from the IPCC?
Who was the first President of the IPCC?

context: <a1_0><a1_2>Korean<a1_2/><a1_0/> ec<a1_1>onomist<a1_1/> <a0_0><a0_1><a0_2><b5_0>Hoesung Lee<b5_0/><a0_2/><a0_1/><a0_0/> is the chair of the IPCC since October 8, <b6_0>2015<b6_0/>, following the election of the new IPCC Bureau. Before this election, the IPCC was led by his vice-Chair <a2_0><a2_1><a2_2><b7_0>Ismail El Gizouli<b7_0/><a2_2/><a2_1/><a2_0/>, who was designated acting Chair after the resignation of Rajendra K. Pachauri in <a4_0><a4_1><a4_2>February <b8_0>2015<b8_0/><a4_2/><a4_1/><a4_0/>. The previous chairs were Rajendra K. Pachauri, elected in May 2002; Robert Watson in 1997; and <a3_0><a3_1><a3_2><b9_0>Bert Bolin<b9_0/><a3_2/><a3_1/><a3_0/> in 1988. The chair is assisted by an elected bureau including vice-chairs, working group co-chairs, and a secretariat.
